item.title: Gwende add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Virgil
item.description: "Audaces fortuna iuvat (latin)- Fortune favors the bold." -- Virgil

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "Status quo, you know, is Latin for 'the mess we're in'." -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Abigail Van Buren
item.description: "The best index to a person's character is how he treats people who can't do him any good, and how he treats people who can't fight back." -- Abigail Van Buren

item.title: Gwende add a quote by John August
item.description: "A little nonsense now and then, Is cherished by the wisest men." -- John August

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Michael Levine
item.description: "Having children makes you no more a parent than having a piano makes you a pianist." -- Michael Levine

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Never, never, never give in!" -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "He who knows all the answers has not been asked all the questions." -- Confucius

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "Honesty is the first chapter of the book wisdom." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Half the world is composed of people who have something to say and can't, and the other half who have nothing to say and keep on saying it." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "God will not look you over for medals, degrees or diplomas but for scars." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The public have an insatiable curiosity to know everything, except what is worth knowing." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gwende add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." -- Margaret Mead

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Gwende add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Life is an opportunity, benefit from it. Life is beauty, admire it. Life is a dream, realize it. Life is a challenge, meet it. Life is a duty, complete it. Life is a game, play it. Life is a promise, fulfill it. Life is sorrow, overcome it. Life is a song, sing it. Life is a struggle, accept it. Life is a tragedy, confront it. Life is an adventure, dare it. Life is luck, make it. Life is too precious, do not destroy it. Life is life, fight for it." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Anne Frank
item.description: "How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world." -- Anne Frank

item.title: Gwende add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I speak to everyone in the same way, whether he is the garbage man or the president of the university." -- Albert Einstein
